content.question: Which of the following arguments about African American liberation is best supported by both sources?

choices.label: The efforts of African Americans in the abolition movement had been insufficient and only foreign intervention could achieve emancipation.
The freedom of enslaved people could be achieved through lawsuits made on the grounds that they were denied their inalienable rights.
The exclusion of African Americans from political participation resulted in mass emigration to countries with better opportunities.
The marginalization of African Americans required decisive action that would end their oppression and promote full integration of African Americans in American society.

content.answer: The marginalization of African Americans required decisive action that would end their oppression and promote full integration of African Americans in American society.
